item.title: Family Conspiracy Unveiled: Seven Arrested for Murder Disguised as Accident in Jogulamba Gadwal.
item.description:
<![CDATA[Shantinagar, Jogulamba Gadwal : A shocking murder disguised as a road accident has been uncovered in Jogulamba Gadwal district. The victim, Sandya Pogu Ramesh (26), a farmer from Tanagala village, was allegedly killed in a planned attack orchestrated by his own family members. The crime, initially believed to be a hit-and-run, was later found to be a cold-blooded murder over property disputes.
Family Feud Turns Deadly
